lead_paragraph: In one of several closely watched contests in New York, Ms. Niou won a six-way Democratic race, defeating Alice Cancel, whom Mr. Silver, the disgraced former speaker, had supported.

headline.print_headline: Niou Defeats Ally of Ex-Speaker in Primary for His Old Assembly Seat
headline.main: Yuh-Line Niou Defeats Sheldon Silver Ally in Primary for His Old Assembly Seat

snippet: In one of several closely watched contests in New York, Ms. Niou won a six-way Democratic race, defeating Alice Cancel, whom Mr. Silver, the disgraced former speaker, had supported....
abstract: Yuh-Line Niou wins Democratic nomination for State Assembly seat once held by Sheldon Silver, defeating Silver's handpicked successor Alice Cancel and four other contenders; results point to shifting demographics and waning influence of Silver; other primary results discussed.
